reporter_caption.center: WAKEFIELD TEACHERS ASSOCIATION v. SCHOOL COM., 41 Mass. App. Ct. 1102 (1996)

caption.center: WAKEFIELD TEACHERS ASSOCIATION vs. SCHOOL COMMITTEE OF WAKEFIELD

opinion.opinion_text: The judgment is vacated and the case is remanded to the Superior Court for further proceedings consistent with the memorandum and order on file in the Appeals Court.
